description: `v-file-upload-item` component represents an individual file item within the `v-file-upload` component.

props.fileIcon: The icon prepending each uploaded file. This will be a preview image if the file is an image.
props.showSize: Show the size of the file

events.click:remove: Emitted when the remove icon is clicked

slots.clear: Slot for the icon button to clear/remove a file
